      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigurationState
      This class defines states with configurations.
      class  FSAState
      An FSAState is no more than a normal State.

      An FSATransition is no more than a normal Transition.

      This class defines states in the intersected NBW.
      (package private) static class  Intersection.NFWIntersectState
      This class defines states in the intersected NFW.
      (package private) class  NBW2DCW.DCWState
      A state of the DCW is a pair of two state sets.
      (package private) class  NBW2NCW.NCWState 
      (package private) class  NGBW2NBWSet.OState
      An OState is a state with an obligation represented as a set of indices indicating the acceptance sets of the generalized Büchi condition left to be passed.
      (package private) class  NMW2NBW.BuchiState
      A BuchiState is a state in the equivalent NBW that contains a corresponding state in the NMW and an index indicating the acceptance set in the Muller condition to be fulfilled.
      (package private) class  NPW2NBW.BuchiState
      A state in the NBW.

    • Uses of GraphicComponent in org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt

      Subclasses of GraphicComponent in org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DelayedSimulation.LOSCompoundState
      This class provides the compound state (b, s1, s2) where s1 is a state from a label-on-state automaton A1 and s2 is a state from a label-on-state automaton A2.
      static class  DelayedSimulation.LOTCompoundState
      This class provides the compound state (s1, s2, a) or (s1, s2) where s1 is a state from a label-on-transition automaton A1, s2 is a state from a label-on-transition automaton A2, and a is a symbol in the alphabet.
      static class  FairSimulation.CompoundState
      This class provides the compound state (s1, s2, a) owned by GamePlayer#P0 or (s1, s2) owned by GamePlayer#P1 where s1 is a state from an automaton A1, s2 is a state from an automaton A2, and a is a symbol in the alphabet.
